reviewText: lost 2 dress sizes in a week doing this

One of the first exercise videos to appear in the 1980s, it was primarily targeted for workouts, but many people i know bought this for entertainment. If you love big hair, hairy chests, mustaches and spandex, you will be happy. Cheesy and campy, but fun none the less.
WHILE VHS IS NOW GONE WISH I COULD GET SAME ON DVD
gets you up and moving  feel fantastic after your workout .and can't wait till you work out again . wish it came in a c d
